AttackEffects.IgnoreConcealed: この攻撃は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{視認困難}状態を無視する。
AttackEffects.IgnoreCover: 対象は劣った遮蔽から利益を受けず、標準の遮蔽によるACボーナスをこの攻撃に対して2減らす
AttackEffects.IncreasedCriticalChance: もし、攻撃が命中し、クリーチャーが出目19をロールしていたなら、クリティカル・ヒットになる。出目19で命中しないなら何の効果もない。
AttackEffects.IncreasedReach5: 間合いが5フィート増える
AttackEffects.InterruptAction: 命中時、対象のアクションは妨害される
AttackEffects.KnockProne: 命中時、対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{伏せ}状態になる

Greater.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {4}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {3}[splash,piercing]]]{3 piercing splash damage}
Greater.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {8)}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {3}[splash,piercing]]]{3 piercing splash damage}

Lesser.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {1}[splash,piercing]]]{1 piercing splash damage}
Lesser.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {2}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {1}[splash,piercing]]]{1 piercing splash damage}

Major.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {5}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {4}[splash,piercing]]]{4 piercing splash damage}
Major.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {10)}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {4}[splash,piercing]]]{4 piercing splash damage}

Moderate.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {3}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {2}[splash,piercing]]]{2 piercing splash damage}
Moderate.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {6)}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and [[/r {2}[splash,piercing]]]{2 piercing splash damage}

Greater.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {3}[splash,mental]]]{3 mental splash damage} and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts until the end of its next turn
Greater.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {3}[splash,mental]]]{3 mental splash damage} and must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts for 1 minute

Lesser.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {1}[splash,mental]]]{1 mental splash damage} and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts until the end of its next turn
Lesser.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {1}[splash,mental]]]{1 mental splash damage} and must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts for 1 minute

Major.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {4}[splash,mental]]]{4 mental splash damage} and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts until the end of its next turn
Major.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {4}[splash,mental]]]{4 mental splash damage} and must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts for 1 minute

Moderate.success: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {2}[splash,mental]]]{2 mental splash damage} and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts until the end of its next turn
Moderate.criticalSuccess: Effect The bomb also deals [[/r {2}[splash,mental]]]{2 mental splash damage} and must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] before taking actions with the concentrate trait, this lasts for 1 minute
